'''''Amon Hen'' 288''' is the two-hundred-and-eighty-eighth issue of the [[The Tolkien Society]]'s bimonthly journal ''[[Amon Hen (journal)|Amon Hen]]'', published in April [[2021]].

==Contents==

* Cover: ''The Shire through the Seasons''

** By: Mathew Suta

** By: Ian Collier

** By: C. E. High
* On the Origin of Hobbits - Part Two
** By: James P. Buchman
* Behind Glass Doors
** By: Ian Collier
* Tolkien and The Hobbit Calendar Shire Reckoning!
** By: Mick Henry
